verses.verse: Oh, let the wickedness of the wicked come to an end, But establish the just; ((1 Sam. 16:7)) For the righteous God tests the hearts and minds.
My defense is of God, Who saves the (Ps. 97:10, 11; 125:4) upright in heart.
God is a just judge, And God is angry with the wicked every day.
If he does not turn back, He will (Deut. 32:41) sharpen His sword; He bends His bow and makes it ready.
He also prepares for Himself instruments of death; He makes His arrows into fiery shafts.
(Job 15:35; Is. 59:4; (James 1:15)) Behold, the wicked brings forth iniquity; Yes, he conceives trouble and brings forth falsehood.
He made a pit and dug it out, ((Job 4:8); Ps. 57:6) And has fallen into the ditch which he made.
(Esth. 9:25; Ps. 140:9) His trouble shall return upon his own head, And his violent dealing shall come down on his own crown.
I will praise the LORD according to His righteousness, And will sing praise to the name of the LORD Most High.
